channel.title: Not Recognized as a internal or external command
channel.description:
It says
'"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18"' is not recognized as a internal or external command. operable program or batch file. ' "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6: ' is not recognized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue. . .
what you think?
These are my Variables:
Variables For Administrator: CLASSPATH: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%; PATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;
System Variables: CLASSPATH: ;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin
I think it is my: ;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip
Because when i go to: ;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext There is no QTJava.zip
There is:
dnsns.jar localedata.jar medta-index sunjce_provider.jar sunmscapi.jar sunpkcs11.jar

item.title: Not Recognized as a internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple436648 MrPurple436648
item.description:
@MrPurple436648 wrote:

Well im fucked over now.

I was told i needed Java 14, so i tried to uninstall java 18. But it wouldnt let me so i deleted all the files.

But now i cannot reinstall java 18 i get this error

“error 1723. there is a problem with tihs windows installer package. A DLL required for this install to complete could not be run. Contact your support personnel or package vendor.”

Im so lost i dont know what to do.

Can you add me on MSN? it would make it so much easier.

Mr.evan_o@Hotmail.com

This was my Run.bat, but now i dont got Java 6u18

@echo off
title FCrazyfaze compile/run
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18” *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6” -Xmx512m server
pause

This was my Compiler

@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18” (call :compile “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Not Recognized as a internal or external command

It says

operable program or batch file.
